Name: Joe
Message: Mr. Bones wanted me to take care of Mr. Cake for him while he deals with a corruption claim by this guy called Stubbs...$b#$hNo idea why the cat even bothers, everyone knows Mr. Cake is best doggo!

Message: $hGood day my child, may the light of Yoba shine upon you.
